law.catch_line: This subtitle does not apply to the following vehicles and their drivers:...
law.text:
This subtitle does not apply to the following vehicles and their drivers:
Except for a vehicle registered under § 13-935(d) of this article, farm equipment or special mobile equipment incidentally operated on a highway or on other property open to the public; or
A vehicle operated on a highway only to cross the highway from one property to another.
